channel.title: CVE Feed for Becton Dickinson (BD) -- BD Pyxis Anesthesia Station ES
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Becton Dickinson (BD) -- BD Pyxis Anesthesia Station ES

item.title: CVE-2022-22766|2024-09-16T19:15:26.998Z -- becton%20dickinson%20%28bd%29 -- bd%20pyxis%20anesthesia%20station%20es
item.description: Hardcoded credentials are used in specific BD Pyxis products. If exploited, threat actors may be able to gain access to the underlying file system and could potentially exploit application files for information that could be used to decrypt application credentials or gain access to electronic protected health information (ePHI) or other sensitive information.
